DOC.detailed_description: Surveillance design : Single-centre , prospective , randomized comparative study . Objectives : To compare maximum flexion ( active passive ) Chair Raise achievement ratio . All complication document . Number subject enrol : All consecutive Scorpio patient include group size 88 reach . Clinical evaluation : Chair raise test , Stair climb test , Western Ontario McMaster Osteoarthritis Index ( WOMAC ) patient self evaluation , EuroQuol - 5 dimension ( EQ-5D ) patient questionnaire . Standard clinical , functional pain parameter ( Knee Society Score ) , pre-operatively post-operatively . All per- post-op complication .
